description:
Have you ever wanted to build a game, but didn't know how to get started making it? Would you like to make computer and mobile games, but don't want to learn a programming language? Well, you've come to the right place!

In this video course you'll learn how to:

  • Create a pinball game without writing code
  • Use Construct 2 software (FREE!)
  • Publish your game to be played on computers and mobile devices
  • Go from complete beginner to game developer

Here's what you'll get:

  • 2.5+ hours of video tutorials
  • All of the source files
  • Artwork, sound effects and music needed to create an interactive, mobile-friendly game
title: Create a Space Pinball Game in Construct 2
